# A.G. Health Industries

## About
A.G. Health Industries Pvt. Ltd. is Nepal's trusted manufacturer of premium hygiene products including baby diapers, face masks, sanitary pads, and toilet paper under the Sagun brand.

## Website
https://aghealthindustries.com

## Products
- Sagun Baby Diapers - Premium quality baby diapers with superior absorption
- Sagun Face Masks - High-quality protective face masks
- Sagun Sanitary Pads - Comfortable and absorbent sanitary pads
- Sagun Toilet Paper - Soft and durable toilet paper

## Contact
Email: kripa.ad25@gmail.com
Location: Kathmandu, Nepal
